page_analysis.text_content:
Allowable daylight plane protrusions summary

Feature
Allowable protrusion
Illustration
Television and radio antennas
up to 15' above maximum building
height
Chimneys and flues < 5' wide
may extend beyond the daylight plane to
meet minimum required clearance of
Building Code (Chapter 16.04)
Fig 20 on p. 26
Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar
architectural features
each feature ≤ 7.5' long and cumulative
length of all features ≤ 15' with min 5'
separation between features (on each
side); height ≤ 24';
Fig 20 on p. 26 &
Fig 23 on p. 28
Comices, eaves, and similar architectural
features (excluding flat or continuous walls
or enclosures usable for interior space)
max 2'
Fig 22 on p. 27

29

visual_elements.description: A table summarizing allowable daylight plane protrusions, organized into three columns: 'Feature', 'Allowable protrusion', and 'Illustration'. It lists different types of architectural features and their corresponding protrusion limits and references to illustrative figures.

technical_specifications.parameter: Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar architectural features - individual feature length
Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar architectural features - cumulative length of all features
Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar architectural features - minimum separation between features
Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar architectural features - height
Cornices, eaves, and similar architectural features protrusion

qualifiers.text: excluding flat or continuous walls or enclosures usable for interior space

conditions.text: up to 15' above maximum building height
may extend beyond the daylight plane to meet minimum required clearance of Building Code (Chapter 16.04)
conditions.threshold_value: meet minimum required clearance of Building Code (Chapter 16.04)

conditions.text: min 5' separation between features (on each side)

logical_relationships.expression: each feature ≤ 7.5' long AND cumulative length of all features ≤ 15' AND min 5' separation between features (on each side) AND height ≤ 24'

execution_sequence.action: Evaluate protrusion for Television and radio antennas
Evaluate protrusion for Chimneys and flues
Evaluate protrusion for Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar architectural features
Evaluate protrusion for Cornices, eaves, and similar architectural features
